presentation.text_1: I started coding in high school, then I truly immersed myself in development in

Vous avez un projet ?: Do you have a project in mind?
Qu’il s’agisse d’un site vitrine, d’une: Whether it's a showcase website, an application, a freelance mission or a job opportunity, feel free to reach out!
N’hésitez pas à me contacter !: Feel free to get in touch!

categories_projects.lemonmaze_api_description: RESTful API in Node.js to communicate with the LemonMaze mobile app via HTTP requests.
categories_projects.lemonmaze_description: LemonMaze is a Flutter mobile app designed to explore Rennes through a series of puzzles based on a route, with rewards at the end.
categories_projects.cosmiclink_description: CosmicLink is a social network with an admin panel formatted as stars/constellations, coded in native PHP.
categories_projects.minuteur_mobile_description: Mobile app in Kotlin, provides three timers for eggs that can be restarted and started, as well as customizable timers that can be edited and deleted with sound notifications.
categories_projects.breizhcoin_description: L2 PHP project where we had to build the back end of a website like Leboncoin, along with some front end.
categories_projects.thebindingofisaac_description: L2 project that involved creating a game similar to TheBindingOfIsaac in Java.
categories_projects.portfolio_v1_description: Old Portfolio to try out the Vue.js framework with responsive design.
categories_projects.flambow_description: This responsive web application, developed with React, Bootstrap, and custom CSS, is the first prototype of Flambow, a platform that facilitates skill-sharing between generations.
categories_projects.badmintonapi_description: Badminton API is a RESTful API built with Node.js for managing court reservations, featuring authentication, role management, and Swagger documentation. It also includes a GraphQL interface.
categories_projects.portfolio_v2_description: Explore my multilingual portfolio, featuring a personal introduction, my resume, and ways to contact me. You will also find information about my hobbies, the languages I master and use, as well as the projects I have worked on.
categories_projects.library_description: Master's project, I had to create a web application with a backend and a frontend for a library, including a reservation system. Please refer to the README.

mentions_legales.title: Legal Notice

editor.title: 1. Site Publisher
editor.address: Address: Not published. In accordance with French law (LCEN), the host retains identifying information and may disclose it to the competent authorities upon request.

host.title: 2. Hosting
host.name: Host: Vercel Inc.
host.address: Address: 340 S Lemon Ave #4133, Walnut, CA 91789, USA

status.title: 4. Website Status
status.text: This website is a personal portfolio with no direct commercial purpose. It does not offer online sales or an account area. In the absence of professional activity, no SIREN/SIRET number is required.

ip.title: 5. Intellectual Property
ip.text: Unless otherwise stated, all content on this site (texts, images, logos, videos, code, graphic resources) is the exclusive property of Théo Guérin. Any reproduction, representation, modification or adaptation, in whole or in part, is prohibited without prior written authorization.

links.title: 6. External Links
links.text: Hyperlinks to other websites do not entail the publisher’s responsibility. Access to third-party sites is at your own risk.

privacy.title: 7. Personal Data
privacy.p1: This site may collect personal data via the contact form (if present) and via audience measurement tools.
privacy.p2: You have the rights of access, rectification, erasure, objection, restriction and data portability. To exercise your rights: theo.guerin35000@gmail.com.
privacy.p3: For more information, please see the Privacy Policy.

cookies.title: 8. Cookies and Analytics
cookies.p1: This site uses Google Analytics 4 only after your consent. Until you accept, no non-essential analytics cookies are set and no data is sent to Google.
cookies.p2: Legal basis: consent (Article 6(1)(a) GDPR). You can change your preferences at any time via “Manage my cookies”.
cookies.p3: Google Ireland Limited acts as a processor. Data transfers outside the EU may occur and are governed by the EU Standard Contractual Clauses. GA4 anonymizes IP addresses by default.

security.title: 9. Security
security.text: Reasonable measures are implemented to ensure the site’s security. The publisher cannot be held liable in the event of intrusion or malware.

law.title: 10. Governing Law
law.text: This legal notice is governed by French law. In the event of a dispute and failing an amicable settlement, French courts shall have exclusive jurisdiction.

mentions_legales.reference_clause: In case of discrepancy between translations, the French version shall prevail.

controller.title: 1. Data Controller
controller.intro: The controller of personal data collected on this website is:

data.title: 2. Data Collected and Purposes
data.intro: Data on this site are collected solely for:
data.contact_form: Contact form: name, email, message. Purpose: to respond to your request.
data.analytics: Audience measurement: via Google Analytics 4 (GA4). Purpose: anonymized statistics to improve the site.
data.legal_basis_contact: Legitimate interest for handling messages received via the contact form.
data.legal_basis_analytics: Explicit consent for enabling Google Analytics.

ga4.title: 3. Google Analytics (GA4)
ga4.p1: This site uses Google Analytics 4 only after your consent. Google Ireland Limited acts as a processor. Data transfers outside the EU may occur and are governed by the EU Standard Contractual Clauses.
ga4.p2: IP addresses are anonymized by default and data are stored for a limited period, in line with CNIL recommendations. You can change your preferences at any time via the panel below or the “Manage my cookies” link in the footer.

recipients.title: 4. Data Recipients
recipients.text: Data collected via the form are accessible only to the site owner. Audience data are sent to Google as the analytics provider.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
rights.intro: In accordance with the GDPR, you have the following rights:
rights.exercise: To exercise your rights, please write to:

security.title: 6. Security
security.text: Appropriate technical and organizational measures are implemented to protect personal data from loss, unauthorized access or disclosure. However, no system is completely secure.

changes.title: 7. Changes
changes.text: This policy may be updated as the site or regulations evolve. Any significant change will be indicated on this page.

contact_update.title: 8. Contact & Update
contact_update.text: For any question about this policy, please write to:

cookie_prefs.title: Privacy Preferences
cookie_prefs.intro_1: Manage your consent for cookies and similar technologies.
cookie_prefs.note: Enabled only with your consent. You can change this at any time.

cookie_banner.text: This site uses Google Analytics only with your consent for anonymized statistics.
